FuncDef: This command displays current the CMPv2 pending request toward the specified CA. If there is no pending request, the last pending request is displayed including the status (success/fail/rejected) and the receive time of last CMPv2 message from server.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a ca-profile name up to 32 characters. If not specified, the system will display pending requests of all ca-profiles.
